title.value: Title D0 : Dissemination and Use Plan Description This document describes the plans for dissemination of knowledge gained during the project and the tentative exploitations plans of the consortium as a whole or of individual partners. Authors FORTH, NOKIA, ETHZ, MASC Link This deliverable is restricted or confidential. Please refer to the contact person for more information.

Title D1 : Report on Key Reference Scenarios Description This document describes key scenarios of the envisioned system. Authors FORTH, NOKIA, ETHZ, MASC Link 2wear_D1_final PDF files, size in KB : 2689

Title D2 : Report on Core Runtime Requirements Description This document describes the requirments concerning core runtime system. Authors NOKIA, ETHZ, FORTH Link 2wear_D2_final PDF files, size in KB : 137

Title D3 : Report on User Requirements Description This document describes the user requirments of a 2Wear system. Authors FORTH, Anthony Savidis, Constantine Stephanidis Link 2wear_D3_final PDF files, size in KB : 185
Title D4 : Report on Hardware Requirements Description This document describes the hardware requirments of the system. Authors MASC, FORTH Link 2wear_D4_final PDF files, size in KB : 167

Title D5 : Report on Overall System Architecture Description This document describes the overall architecture of 2WEAR system. Authors NOKIA, ETHZ, FORTH Link 2wear_D5_final PDF files, size in KB : 265

Title D6 : Report on Design of Core Runtime Description This document describes the design of the core runtime for a 2WEAR system. Authors ETHZ, FORTH, NOKIA Link 2wear_D6_final PDF files, size in KB : 195

Title D7 : Report on User Interaction Framwork Design Description This document reports on the design of the user interaction framwork. Authors FORTH, Anthony Savidis, Constantine Stephanidis Link 2wear_D7_final PDF files, size in KB : 402
Title D8 : Report on Hardware Devices Design Description This document describes the hardware design of devices of a 2WEAR system. Authors MASC Link 2wear_D8_final PDF files, size in KB : 357

Title D9 : Report on System Interoperability and Device Interactions Description This document describes the protocol notation and communication mechanism to be used by the various devices of the 2WEAR system in order to communicate and interact with each other. Also, the various interactions corresponding to the demo scenario are specified in terms of specific services and connectivity diagrams. Authors FORTH, NOKIA, ETHZ, MASC Link This deliverable is restricted or confidential. Please refer to the contact person for more information.

Title D10 : Report on User Interaction Framework APIs Description This document reports on the software implementation and programming APIs of the User Interface framework. Authors FORTH, Anthony Savidis, Constantine Stephanidis Link 2wear_D10_final PDF files, size in KB : 629

Title D15 : Futuristic Application Environment Description This document describes the futuristic application environment that will be used to demonstrate the prototype wearable system. Authors FORTH, NOKIA, ETHZ, MASC Link This deliverable is restricted or confidential. Please refer to the contact person for more information.

Title D21 : Report on Evaluation Description This document reports on the final assesment of the : development instruments, the interoperability framework, and the demonstrator applications. Authors FORTH, Anthony Savidis, Constantine Stephanidis Link 2wear_D21_draft PDF files, size in KB : 2648
